question: Who in the Amateur Radio Service is called an amateur or an amateur radio operator?

question: When is any person permitted to transmit by voice while operating the amateur station of a licensee?

question: What is strictly prohibited under the Rules Governing Operation of Amateur Stations?

choices.A: Operation without a valid amateur radio operator certificate or radio station license
choices.B: Transmission with false or misleading identification
choices.C: Transmission of messages or signals containing profane or indecent words or language

question: What shall an amateur do upon knowing his station is causing harmful interference to the operation of any existing station?

choices.D: Ignore the operation of the existing

question: What appropriate action can the NTC take on the harmful interference caused by an amateur statio?

choices.B: Limit the power of the working hours
choices.C: Order the temporary closure in the event of continued interference
